basics.label: Senior Product Communication Specialist
basics.summary: Product Communication Specialist transitioning to Front-End Development, with hands-on experience in Python, C++ and Linux environments. Proven ability to implement Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and working with web technologies (JavaScript, SEO). Ability to utilise development tools such as Docker and git, as well as to contribute to open-source projects. Adept at learning new frameworks and working cross-functionally with developers to deliver web solutions. Seeking a Junior Front-End Developer role to further hone technical skills and contribute to impactful web applications.
